mens-product.title: HammerSmith
mens-product.description: HammerSmith Men Solid Slim Fit Cotton Casual Shirt with Spread Collar & Full Sleeves Shirt
mens-product.descrip:
Care Instructions: Machine Wash
Fit Type: Regular Fit
Style note: Stylish and trending full sleeve casual shirt for casual & smart casual wear
Look & feel: 100% cotton with soft finish and rich look
Product elements: Double yoke for extra durability & stiffness; Pocket at chest
Wash instructions: Machine wash cold, wash with like colors, tumble dry medium or hang dry in shade, warm iron, turn inside out when washing, do not iron directly on print & embroidery
Disclaimer: product colour may vary due to photographic lighting sources or your display settings
mens-product.Manufacturer: THOMAS SCOTT INDIA LTD., FCC, Solapur; bol@banggroup.com

kids-product.title: Bold N Elegant - Be Bold Inside & Elegant Outside Store
kids-product.brand: Bold N Elegant - Be Bold Inside & Elegant Outside Store
kids-product.description: Bold N Elegant - Be Bold Inside & Elegant Outside Baby's Cotton Tshirt Pant Set
kids-product.descrip:
Care Instructions: Machine Wash
Fit Type: Regular
Dress up your young boy/girl in this cool funky, sky blue and grey colored full-length set by bold n elegant. A 100% cotton make, this set features a top and bottom that ensure ease of movement and comfort
Little dude on the move will attract every wandering eye in this pack of sweatshirt and bottom, a full length set from bold n elegant. Designed using cotton, these full length set will ensure complete comfort to the little one as he wiggles and wriggles in a cute motion
With a luxuriously soft cotton use, this super-comfy full length set will be perfect for a fair-weather adventure
